static xmlDeserialize (SabreXml\Reader $reader)
Description détaillée
Our own sabre/xml key-value element.
It just removes the clark notation.
Copyright
Copyright (C) fruux GmbH (https://fruux.com/)

Ivan Enderlin @license http://sabre.io/license/ Modified BSD License
Documentation des fonctions membres
xmlDeserialize() xmlDeserializeKeyValue KeyValuexmlDeserialize
static xmlDeserialize (SabreXml\Reader $reader)[static]
The deserialize method is called during xml parsing.
This method is called statically, this is because in theory this method may be used as a type of constructor, or factory method.
Often you want to return an instance of the current class, but you are free to return other data as well.
Important note 2: You are responsible for advancing the reader to the next element. Not doing anything will result in a never-ending loop.
If you just want to skip parsing for this element altogether, you can just call $reader->next();
$reader->parseInnerTree() will parse the entire sub-tree, and advance to the next element.
Paramètres
XML\Reader$reader
La documentation de cette classe a été générée à partir du fichier suivant : public/glpi/vendor/sabre/vobject/lib/Parser/XML/Element/KeyValue.php
